extendedInfo.description: * Princess memory game for kids is the classic board game, which help develop memory skills of children.* Playing this game with your kid will help them improve their recognition while having fun.* Game contains very cute images of princesses, mermaids, unicorns, pink ponies, fairies, castles, knights, horses, queens,â¦ which are on memory cards.* Princess memory game for kids is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. Especially girls will love this game.HOW TO PLAY:Initially you will see all cards turned face down. Tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both memory cards will be the same, they will stay opened and you can continue with the next pair. Otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try. Try to find all matched cards as fast as possible.FEATURES:- 3 different difficulty (easy: 2x3; medium: 3x4; hard: 4x5)- develops recognition, concentration and motor skills of kids- cute sounds- colorful HD graphic designed for toddlers- beautiful images of princess, mermaids, unicorns, pink ponies, ...- designed for girls- visual memory training* Simple and intuitive interface which is easy to use and easy to play, specially designed for children.* Princess memory game for kids is also optimized for tablets (provide HD pictures).

reviews.title: My 5 year old loves it. Thanks

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: My 5 year old daughter and 3 year old daughter both love this game! Its so cute and a fun way for them to learn. I love it!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: My 3 yr old daughter loves this game! I also love how there is different subject matter to choose from, e.g. princess, cars, animals.

reviews.title: Fun for the kids
reviews.comment: Great app. My girls love it, even my 2 year old can play. Only downfall is when they accidentally touch the adds it takes you to the add page and you can\'t get out of it unless you kill the app first. Simply hitting the back button doesn\'t do any good. Just reloads the add page. Please fix for more stars!
reviews.author: Jody Day

reviews.title: Grate

reviews.comment: My 2 year old loves this app. She is actually remembering where previous cards were for a pair and she picked it up really quick.

reviews.title: Best kids memory game!
reviews.comment: I have this game for my 3 yr old granddaughter in phone, tablet & computer! So does her mom. She loves it n caught on really fast! The levels are great! Happy to have her entertained while she improves her memory n problem solving skills!
